Question: Do you require the application to support Multi-Language?
Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus is available in more than 20 Languages. Refer the below links to know more about the Supported Languages both in On-Premises & in On-Demand Versions. https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/localized-versions.html https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/supported-languages.html

Question: Do you require Fail Over Service?
Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus can run on High Availability. Please refer to the below link for more details. https://help.servicedeskplus.com/configurations/failover-service/failover-service.html

Question: Do you require Enterprise Service Management?
Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus supports Enterprise Service Management - which allows multiple helpdesk instances like IT, HR, Finance, etc. to be created/configured under 1 organization account. Each instance can have its own technicians, workflows, templates, etc. & are licensed separately which includes Technicians, Editions, Add-ons, etc.  For On-premise version you can have max 15 instances. Refer the below link to know more about the same. https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/enterprise-service-desk-management.html

No.Question: Which edition of ServiceDesk Plus do you need?
No.Explanation:
ServiceDesk Plus is available in 3 editions as Standard, Professional & Enterprise. Refer the below link to know more about the differences between the editions. 
 https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/sdp-editions.html

No.Question: Number of Technicians required?
No.Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus is licensed based on the number of 'Named Technicians' who needs access to the application for managing the Tickets, Assets, Problem, Change, CMDB, Purchase, Contracts, Reports, etc. There is no licensing/limitation on the number of users who can Report an Issue or Request for Service.

No.Question: Number of Nodes
No.Explanation:
Applicable only for Professional & Enterprise Editions. 
 ServiceDesk Plus is also licensed based on the total number of Nodes/Assets. ServiceDesk Plus supports adding assets under 2 categories as IT Asset & as Non IT Assets. All assets added under IT Asset Category either by scanning the network or by adding through CSV file or by adding manually using the New Asset Addition form will be considered as Node & for licensing. Assets can also be added under Non IT Asset Category through CSV or using the form where Scanning is not supported & there is no license required for Non IT Assets.

No.Question: Project Management
No.Explanation:
You can learn more about the Project Management Add-on from the below link. 
 https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/itsm/it-project-management-tracking-software.html

 https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/sdp-editions.html

Question: Do you require UEM Remote Access Plus add-on for ServiceDesk Plus?
Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus can manage the Advanced Remote Control over WAN, Asset Scanning, Enable Chat, Wake on Lan, Publish Announcements, System Manager using UEM Remote Access Plus add-on. Refer the below link to know more on this Add-On  https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/integrations/system-tools.html

Yes.Question: Please specify the number of computers for which you require this add-on to be enabled.
Yes.Explanation: Manage the Advanced Remote Control over WAN, Asset Scanning, Enable Chat, Wake on LAN, Publish Announcements & System Manager.

Yes.Question: How many additional users require access to UEM Remote Access Plus add-on?
Yes.Explanation: By default 5 user license will be given with Professional/Enterprise editions.

Question: Do you require Active Directory Management Add-on of ServiceDesk Plus?
Explanation: Active Directory Management Add-on of ServiceDesk Plus is to manage Active Directory using ManageEngine AD Manager Plus. By opting for this add-on, AD Manager Plus will be integrated with ServiceDesk Plus. This add-on is licensed based on Number of Domains to be managed, Number of AD ServiceDesk Technicians & Number of Privileged AD Technicians.

Yes.Question: How many Active Directory Domains are required to be managed?
Yes.Explanation: By default, you can manage 1 domain using this add-on. If you require more than 1 domains to be managed, please specify.

Yes.Question: How many AD ServiceDesk Technicians requires access?
Yes.Explanation: These technicians can only perform User Creation, Password Reset & Account Unlock in AD.

Yes.Question: How many Privileged AD Technicians requires access?
Yes.Explanation: These technicians can perform privileged activities supported in AD Manager Plus, like Group Management, Computer Management, OU Management, User Management, etc.
